verses.text: In the \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*; and \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* he in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Zibiah|strong="H6645"\w* of \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w*.

And \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* all his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* wherein \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w instructed|strong="H3384"\w* him.

But the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* were not taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w*: the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* still \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* and burnt \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* in the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.

¶ And \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, All the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* of the dedicated \w things|strong="H6944"\w* that is \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add even\add* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* of every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* that \w passeth|strong="H5674"\w* \add the account\add*, the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* that every \w man|strong="H5315"\w* is set \w at|strong="H6187"\w*, \add and\add* all the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* that \w cometh|strong="H5927"\w* into any \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*,  +  r 12.4  t dedicated things: or, holy things: Heb. holinesses *  +  r 12.4  t that every…: Heb. of the souls of his estimation *  +  r 12.4  t cometh…: Heb. ascendeth upon the heart of a man *

Let the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add it\add* to them, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of his \w acquaintance|strong="H4378"\w*: and let them \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* the \w breaches|strong="H0919"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, wheresoever any \w breach|strong="H0919"\w* shall be \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

But it was \add so, that\add* in the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* had not \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* the \w breaches|strong="H0919"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 12.6 \ft three…: Heb. twentieth year and third year\f*

Then \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \add other\add* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Why \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* ye not the \w breaches|strong="H0919"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*? now therefore \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* no \add more\add* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* of your \w acquaintance|strong="H4378"\w*, but \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* it for the \w breaches|strong="H0919"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w consented|strong="H0225"\w* to \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w no|strong="H1115"\w* \add more\add* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w neither|strong="H1115"\w* to \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* the \w breaches|strong="H0919"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

But \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w chest|strong="H0727"\w*, and \w bored|strong="H5344"\w* a \w hole|strong="H2356"\w* in the \w lid|strong="H1817"\w* of it, and \w set|strong="H5414"\w* it \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, on the right \w side|strong="H3225"\w* as \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w door|strong="H5592"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* therein all the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \add that was\add* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 12.9  t door: Heb. threshold *

And it was \add so\add*, when they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \add there was\add* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* in the \w chest|strong="H0727"\w*, that the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* and the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and they put up in \w bags|strong="H6696"\w*, and \w told|strong="H4487"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* that was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 12.10 \ft scribe: or, secretary\f*\f + \fr 12.10 \ft put…: Heb. bound up\f*

And they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, being \w told|strong="H8505"\w*, into the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of them that \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, that had the \w oversight|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and they laid it \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w carpenters|strong="H2796"\w* and \w builders|strong="H1129"\w*, that \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* upon the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*,  +  r 12.11  t laid…: Heb. brought it forth *

And to \w masons|strong="H1443"\w*, and \w hewers|strong="H2672"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, and to \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* and \w hewed|strong="H4274"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* to \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* the \w breaches|strong="H0919"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for all that was laid \w out|strong="H3318"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to \w repair|strong="H2394"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 12.12 \ft was…: Heb. went forth\f*

Howbeit there were not \w made|strong="H6213"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w bowls|strong="H5592"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w snuffers|strong="H4212"\w*, \w basons|strong="H4219"\w*, \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*, any \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, or \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, of the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \add that was\add* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*:
But they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* that to the \w workmen|strong="H4399"\w*, and \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* therewith the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Moreover they \w reckoned|strong="H2803"\w* not with the \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, into whose \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* they \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* to be \w bestowed|strong="H5414"\w* on \w workmen|strong="H4399"\w*: for they \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* \w faithfully|strong="H0530"\w*.

The \w trespass|strong="H0817"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* and \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* was not \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: it was the \w priests’|strong="H3548"\w*.

¶ Then \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3920"\w* it: and \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* all the hallowed \w things|strong="H6944"\w* that \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, and \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w*, and \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*, his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, had \w dedicated|strong="H6942"\w*, and his own hallowed \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, and all the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \add that was\add* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and in the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \add it\add* to \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*: and he went \w away|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 12.18 \ft went…: Heb. went up\f*

¶ And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

And his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w made|strong="H7194"\w* a \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Millo|strong="H4407"\w*, which goeth \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Silla|strong="H5538"\w*.\f + \fr 12.20 \ft the house…: or, Bethmillo\f*

For \w Jozachar|strong="H3108"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimeath|strong="H8100"\w*, and \w Jehozabad|strong="H3075"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shomer|strong="H7763"\w*, his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, and he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*; and they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: and \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.
